message: 👋 Welcome to the SUNCREST Virtual Event Platform.
⚙️ Please contact jade.gardiner@swm-partners.com if you require technical support
💬 We will be taking questions after each presentation. Type your questions in the interactive window or use the raise hand button when invited to do so
📋Let us know how the meeting is going so far – complete our half time survey in the polls window
🙏 Thank you for attending! Let us know your thoughts about the meeting via the survey in the polls window or on the post event email.
